sub_title: English Department & Teacher Education, Institute Archimedes, University of Applied Sciences Utrecht
summary:
I am currently a teacher trainer, teaching Methodology and Research courses in the Bachelor and Master programmes at the Utrecht University of Applied Sciences, Institute Archimedes. I am the product manager for Methodology and Research courses, a member of the innovation team designing the new programmes and also an expert in digital didactics, responsible for curriculum, integrating digital didactics and information literacy in the new programmes for teaching languages. My focus is digital content and instructional design.

While living and working in Slovenia,  I was leading the national research, strategy planning, and implementation of curricula in the field of digital education and the use of ICT in education at the Quality and Research Centre at the National Education Institute Slovenia.

I have also led the national E-competent teacher project in which we designed the standard of e-competent teachers, principals, and ICT coordinators in the school framework called The Way towards E-competency. I focused on designing key e-competencies and developing the efficient training model called The Way towards E-competency, leading the instructional design and the development of online courses for in-service teacher training and professional development to raise the digital literacy of teachers in schools nationwide.

I worked internationally as the national expert in the consultancy team at the Joint Research Centre of the European Commission working on the DIGCOMP: A Framework for Developing and Understanding Digital Competence in Europe.

I was also designing new curricula and implementing key competencies in vocational education and developing new approaches to teaching foreign languages with the use of ICT. I was also a member of the National exam committee for foreign languages and my special field of research and development is the assessment of competencies in an online environment.

Personal bibliography: http://izumbib.izum.si/bibliografije/Y20150312070236-A7652963.html

KEY ACHIEVEMENTS
Led the national E-Competent Teacher project for five years, was responsible for the project team, 20 e-development teams, i.e. 270 team members and around 700 project collaborators.
Was the E-learning Expert in the international Twinning project - Strengthening Institutional Capacity of the AfE, working with three institution from different cities in Bosnia, designing and organising their online collaboration and training.
Had chaired sessions at the ONLINE EDUCA conference in Berlin and the SIRikt International Conference in Slovenia, and managed the international visit programme between Slovenia and the Netherlands.
Participated actively at many domestic and international (annual) conferences and events (MIRK, SIRikt, VIVID, Microsoft NT, e-Twining, Online Educa in  Berlin, Bett in London …)
Organised and led train the trainer workshops.
Am a coordinator for E-learning projects, i.e. organising and consulting pilot schools developing digital pedagogy and teachers who participate in various international and national projects involving the use of ICT in teaching.
I was the external evaluator for the national agency for European project.
